page.title: 15The Fish Farm 1
page.content: In the fish farm there are 400 000 fish and they are salmon,rainbow trout brown trout and turbot.Loch Fyne is a good spot to have cages because it is a clean deep loch.The fish just now are worth Â£1\ million but they are increasing every day by 2 or 3 percent in value. In the hatchery there are 35 tanks and they are all full of fish.There are also 65 cages in Loch Fyne.The fish get moved from small tanks to bigger tanks as they get bigger. A computer works the feeding and controls the temperature.Herring meal with added vitamins is used to feed the fish.The meal is bought in from a fish factory.The fish go through 1\ tons of food a day but that amount also increases every day by 2 or 3 percent.
